message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,750,000. This is a fair price given its value and the potential benefits it offers. I'm confident this will be a mutually beneficial deal.
Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of your product, but I am only able to offer $1,500,000 for it. I hope we can find a way to meet in the middle.

Bob, I appreciate your offer and your willingness to negotiate. While $1,500,000 is closer to my expectation, I'm still hoping to get a bit closer to my initial asking price. How about $1,650,000? This leaves room for both of us to walk away with a good deal.
Alice, I've reviewed your latest offer and I'm willing to consider $1,600,000 for the product. This is the highest amount I can realistically offer at this time.
